agent_utterance: Tonight, try a tiny, reliable evening ritual: after a brief 2-minute pause with a glass of water and a couple of deep breaths, choose one simple, pre-portioned snack you can assemble in under 2 minutes—for example, a small apple with 1 tablespoon peanut butter. Eat at a fixed time (around your usual evening routine). Keep it straightforward, and afterward jot a one-line note about how you felt before and after to close the loop. This steady, low-friction step fits your need for structure and gently nudges progress over time.
